ctx: intros s a p c r0 r1 H H0.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 0 patterns.

original: intros s a p c r0 r1 H H0. unfold s_produit_l. destruct (s) eqn:Es. - simpl in H0. rewrite H0 in H. discriminate H. - destruct (a =? a0)%N eqn:EqA. ++ rewrite EqA in H. simpl. rewrite H0. apply f_equal. apply in_M1_id. exists c. auto. ++ simpl in H. rewrite EqA in H. simpl in H. discriminate H. - destruct (a) eqn:EqZero. ++ simpl. rewrite H0. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity. ++ destruct s0; simpl in *. ** rewrite H0. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity. ** simpl in H0. rewrite H0. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity. ** apply in_M2_disj in H0. destruct H0 as [Hl|Hr]. +++ simpl. apply in_M1_id in Hl. subst. apply f_equal. rewrite H in Hl. auto. +++ simpl. apply in_M1_id in Hr. subst. apply f_equal. rewrite H in Hr. auto.
